activities: We receive account registration data from customers. This includes name, address, phone number, email, and credit card information to process payments. This information is not shared with outside parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer. The data does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: WorthPoint Corporation uses a specific private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism, Better Business Bureau (BBB), that incorporates the Safe Harbor Framework.
